all_questions.question: Can we drop source language words without mapping them to any target language word?
all_questions.context: Another thing that we can easily do is to drop the words of the source language, because we can simply ignore that word.

all_questions.question: What happens if a source word does not map to any target language word?
all_questions.context: If none of the target language words maps to that, there will be no alignment link and that source words will be dropped.

all_questions.question: What is the purpose of adding new information?
Can we ignore source language words to simplify the alignment process?

all_questions.question: What would happen if adding new information were not considered?
